operators.sql: SELECT p1."nowGroup", p1."grpID", p1."timeStep", sum(p2.mass) as mass, count(*) as "totalParticles", sum(p2."HI") as "HI" FROM "public:vulcan:groupsOfInterest" p1, "public:vulcan:snapshot1818Hash" p2 WHERE p1."grpID" = p2.grp and p1."timeStep" = 1 GROUP BY p1."nowGroup", p1."grpID", p1."timeStep" UNION SELECT p1."nowGroup", p1."grpID", p1."timeStep", sum(p2.mass) as mass, count(*) as "totalParticles", sum(p2."HI") as "HI" FROM "public:vulcan:groupsOfInterest" p1, "public:vulcan:snapshot1745Hash" p2 WHERE p1."grpID" = p2.grp and p1."timeStep" = 2 GROUP BY p1."nowGroup", p1."grpID", p1."timeStep" UNION SELECT p1."nowGroup", p1."grpID", p1."timeStep", sum(p2.mass) as mass, count(*) as "totalParticles", sum(p2."HI") as "HI" FROM "public:vulcan:groupsOfInterest" p1, "public:vulcan:snapshot1648Hash" p2 WHERE p1."grpID" = p2.grp and p1."timeStep" = 3 GROUP BY p1."nowGroup", p1."grpID", p1."timeStep" UNION SELECT p1."nowGroup", p1."grpID", p1."timeStep", sum(p2.mass) as mass, count(*) as "totalParticles", sum(p2."HI") as "HI" FROM "public:vulcan:groupsOfInterest" p1, "public:vulcan:snapshot1556Hash" p2 WHERE p1."grpID" = p2.grp and p1."timeStep" = 4 GROUP BY p1."nowGroup", p1."grpID", p1."timeStep" UNION SELECT p1."nowGroup", p1."grpID", p1."timeStep", sum(p2.mass) as mass, count(*) as "totalParticles", sum(p2."HI") as "HI" FROM "public:vulcan:groupsOfInterest" p1, "public:vulcan:snapshot1536Hash" p2 WHERE p1."grpID" = p2.grp and p1."timeStep" = 5 GROUP BY p1."nowGroup", p1."grpID", p1."timeStep" UNION SELECT p1."nowGroup", p1."grpID", p1."timeStep", sum(p2.mass) as mass, count(*) as "totalParticles", sum(p2."HI") as "HI" FROM "public:vulcan:groupsOfInterest" p1, "public:vulcan:snapshot1469Hash" p2 WHERE p1."grpID" = p2.grp and p1."timeStep" = 6 GROUP BY p1."nowGroup", p1."grpID", p1."timeStep" UNION SELECT p1."nowGroup", p1."grpID", p1."timeStep", sum(p2.mass) as mass, count(*) as "totalParticles", sum(p2."HI") as "HI" FROM "public:vulcan:groupsOfInterest" p1, "public:vulcan:snapshot1387Hash" p2 WHERE p1."grpID" = p2.grp and p1."timeStep" = 7 GROUP BY p1."nowGroup", p1."grpID", p1."timeStep"

logicalRa: compute partial halo table per worker
rawQuery: compute partial halo table per worker
